name: Authentic Vietnamese Townhouse
address: 2nd Floor, 39 Hang Dieu, Hoan Kiem District, Old Quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 500 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi. The property is 600 metres from Dong Xuan Market and private parking is offered.

The kitchen features a fridge. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is provided.

Ngoc Son Temple is 600 metres from Authentic Vietnamese Townhouse, while Thang Long Water Puppet Theater is 700 metres away. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km from the property.
